function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate working environment within living space","Impact":"Reduced productivity, increased stress, and discomfort","Mitigation":"Facilitating the creation of dedicated home office spaces, providing ergonomic furniture, and implementing noise reduction measures","Technologies":"Smart home technology for noise reduction, adjustable standing desks, and video conferencing tools","People":"Residents, remote workers, students","Owner":"Real estate developers, employers, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of contact with nature and outdoor space during lockdown","Impact":"Decreased mental well-being, limited physical activity, and increased feelings of isolation","Mitigation":"Providing access to outdoor spaces, creating rooftop gardens, and incorporating balconies or terraces in residential buildings","Technologies":"Green roof systems, rooftop gardening tools, and balcony design enhancements","People":"Residents, families, individuals in self-isolation","Owner":"Real estate developers, building managers, local authorities"},{"Description":"Inability to self-isolate in common areas of the building","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and compromised safety of residents","Mitigation":"Implementing clear guidelines for self-isolation, providing separate isolation facilities, and enhancing ventilation systems","Technologies":"Air purification systems, smart access control, and surveillance technologies","People":"Residents, visitors, building staff","Owner":"Building managers, local health authorities"}]}
